myAccount.professionalReferencesInstructions: [NEEDS_TRANSLATION]You may list multiple auction houses or companies where you have previously participated in auctions. This helps us verify your identity and ensure a smooth bidding experience.

myCredit.maxBidLimitsHelp: [NEEDS_TRANSLATION]In this section you can set your own limit to any bidder number you have. Limiting the bids will cut off your potential winnings at that number so you don't end up winning more than you have planned on spending.

orGroupExplanation.title: [NEEDS_TRANSLATION]OR Bids Group
orGroupExplanation.main: [NEEDS_TRANSLATION]Add lots to a group (A-J) when you want to win only one item. Once you win an item in the group, your other group bids are cancelled'
orGroupExplanation.example: [NEEDS_TRANSLATION]Example: If lots 1, 2, 3 are in Group A and you win lot 1, your bids on lots 2 and 3 will be automatically cancelled

myBids.groupHasClosedItems: [NEEDS_TRANSLATION]Cannot add to this group - it contains closed items

myBids.deletedByGroupTooltip: [NEEDS_TRANSLATION]This bid was automatically cancelled because you won another lot in the same Or Bids group

userInterests.title: [NEEDS_TRANSLATION]My Interests
userInterests.pageDescription: [NEEDS_TRANSLATION]Help us understand your collecting interests! Add categories of items you'd like to follow, and we'll notify you when matching items become available in our auctions. You can always adjust your preferences here.
userInterests.searchInstructions: [NEEDS_TRANSLATION]Use the search box below to find and add categories that interest you. You can search by typing any part of the category path (e.g., 'Stamps', 'Germany', or '1900'). Categories where you've previously bid will remain in your list even when inactive, and you can reactivate them at any time using the search. Categories without bids will be removed when deactivated.
userInterests.noSearchResults: [NEEDS_TRANSLATION]No matching categories found. Try different search terms.
userInterests.browseExplanation: [NEEDS_TRANSLATION]View items that match your selected categories of interest. The items will be automatically filtered based on your active categories.
userInterests.additionalInterestsHelp: [NEEDS_TRANSLATION]Use this field to tell us about any specific interests or items you're looking for that might not be covered by the categories above. For example, specific themes, origins, time periods, or particular types of items.
userInterests.additionalInterestsPlaceholder: [NEEDS_TRANSLATION]E.g., specific themes, origins, conditions, or particular collections...

subscriptionMagazine.subscriptionBenefits: [NEEDS_TRANSLATION]With a subscription, you'll get unlimited access to all magazines, exclusive content, and new issues as soon as they're published.

placeBid.itemNotActiveButHasLiveBids: [NEEDS_TRANSLATION]This item is no longer accepting bids
placeBid.liveAuctionOpen: [NEEDS_TRANSLATION]This item is available in the live auction
placeBid.noCreditLimitPrefix: [NEEDS_TRANSLATION]In order to place Agent bids, you must have a Credit limit set.
placeBid.agentBidTooltip: [NEEDS_TRANSLATION]Online Agent bidding allows you to set a maximum bid amount. The system will automatically bid on your behalf up to your maximum during the live auction.
placeBid.mailBidTooltip: [NEEDS_TRANSLATION]Mail bids (also called absentee or book bids) are pre-auction bids that compete with live bidders. Your bid will be executed automatically during the auction.
placeBid.obscuredBidTooltip: [NEEDS_TRANSLATION]In an obscured auction, bid amounts are hidden from other bidders. Submit your best offer and it will be revealed after the auction closes.
placeBid.makeOfferTooltip: [NEEDS_TRANSLATION]This item is available for post-sale offers. Submit your best offer and the seller will review it.
placeBid.bidRejected: [NEEDS_TRANSLATION]Your bid was rejected. Please try again or contact support.

placeBid.bidRejectedOutbid: [NEEDS_TRANSLATION]Your bid was rejected because another bidder has placed a higher bid. Please increase your bid.
placeBid.bidRejectedNoCreditLimit: [NEEDS_TRANSLATION]Your bid cannot be registered because you do not have a credit limit set. Please contact the auction house or request credit limit in My Bids.
placeBid.agentBidNoCreditWarning: [NEEDS_TRANSLATION]Your bid was placed, but you do not have a credit limit set. Your bid may not be executed during the live auction. Please set your credit limit in My Bids.
placeBid.bidExceedsCreditLimit: [NEEDS_TRANSLATION]Your bid exceeds your available credit limit. Please request more credit in My Bids or contact the auction house to increase your credit limit.
placeBid.buyNowTooltip: [NEEDS_TRANSLATION]Purchase this item immediately at a fixed price. This item is only available for direct purchase and does not accept bids.
